Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Water Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Huge Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Water Temple Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #Farore's Wind#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that at the #bottom of Zora's Fountain# lies #a Hookshot#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #3# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Light Trial)

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: While you're wasting time reading this hint, the others are playing the seed.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Phantom Ganon# holds...^ #Saria's Song# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
